description: Microsoft, SAP SE, and IBM have continued to maintain operations in Russia. In response, groups of workers at these companies have called for them to do more than just end new sales and to instead withdraw completely. Workers also discussed and criticized the companies’ stances in internal discussion forums, with some Microsoft workers even threatening to quit if the company doesn’t exit. Other workers worry about the withdrawal’s potential effect on civilians.
author: wynniechan
